Core Models¶

class apps.core.models.Documentation(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Documentation is grouping pages according to the product that they document, usually in one of it’s versions (e.g. https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/1.3/).

delete_irrelevant_links(older_than=None, by_create_date=True, by_mod_date=False)[source]¶

Clean up irrelevant links for all sections of all pages of this documentation. Delete links with creation or modification date older than a given date.

Warning

Cleans up ALL links if ‘older_than’ is not specified.

fetch_meta()[source]¶

Fetch the documentation’s meta-related information (html meta) and update corresponding fields.

class apps.core.models.Link(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Link is a connection between an link and a section.

Links are url-unique within a section.

delete(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Log the link data before deleting it.

incr_clicks()[source]¶

Increment ‘clicks’ by 1.

incr_up_votes()[source]¶

Increment ‘up_votes’ by 1.

set_relevant(is_relevant=True)[source]¶

Set ‘is_relevant’ value to True(deafult) or False.

validate_url()[source]¶

Check if the url is still valid.

class apps.core.models.Page(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Page represents one url (one page) of the documentation.

delete_irrelevant_links(older_than=None, by_create_date=True, by_mod_date=False)[source]¶

Clean up irrelevant links for all sections of the page. Delete links with creation or modification date older than a given date.

Warning

Cleans up ALL links if ‘older_than’ is not specified.

fetch_meta()[source]¶

Fetch the page’s meta-related information (html meta) and update corresponding fields.

class apps.core.models.Section(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Section is a section of the documentation’s page which is specific enough to attach links to it.

cache_key¶

Generate a cache key based on unique fields.

delete_irrelevant_links(older_than=None, by_create_date=True, by_mod_date=False)[source]¶

Clean up irrelevant links of the section. Delete links with creation or modification date older than a given date.

Warning

Cleans up ALL links if ‘older_than’ is not specified.
